decimal stored as a base 1e18 uint256, issuance accurate to 8 digits precision)","underlying":"the address of the underlying token "}},"mint(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount of underlying tokens to lend","maturity":"the maturity of the market","underlying":"the address of the underlying token being lent"}},"redeem(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount of underlying tokens to redeem and bond tokens to burn","maturity":"the maturity of the market being redeemed","underlying":"the address of the underlying token being redeemed"}},"repay(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount of underlying token debt to pay","maturity":"the maturity of the market being redeemed","underlying":"the address of the underlying token being paid"}},"transferAdmin(address)":{"params":{"newAdmin":"Address of the new
